name: D Custom
description:
D Custom is a full-service digital marketing agency driven by great content that spans from print to digital, video to social. We act as a seamless extension of our mid-market and enterprise clients to create and amplify compelling content that engages customers, moves them through the purchase cycle, builds brand affinity, and drives business value.Â 
Founded in 2001 as the custom publishing arm of D Magazine, we quickly evolved into a full-service digital marketing agency.
